entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of drizzle mixed with freezing drizzle. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle ending this morning then cloudy with flurries beginning this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023
